We got a huge update today

Heather and Mike Martin have pled guilty to
child neglect as part of a plea agreement
under the plea agreement they received a 10-year suspended prison sentence
and five years supervised probation

So what that means is that as of right now they are not going to jail.
But in the five years that they have probation.
If they violate the rules they will face up to ten years in prison
The plea was what they call an Alford plea
It's a special kind of guilty which means they are not necessarily admitting that what they did was wrong
But they agree that the state has enough evidence to prove guilt moving forward.
Also as part of the plea agreement they are not allowed to contact the two children Cody and Emma without a judge's approval
the probation reportedly also restricts them from posting pictures and video of Cody and Emma
unless they're for family use
